allow: Bash(for file in framework/auto-theme.html framework/colors.html framework/doc.html framework/gradients.html framework/js-calculator.html)
Bash(for file in framework/auto-theme.html framework/colors.html framework/doc.html framework/gradients.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|JS Calculator|JS Calculator\n |' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/<span class=""fs-12"">JS Calculator<\/span>/<span class=""fs-12"">JS Calculator<\/span>\n            <\/a>/' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/<span class=""fs-12"">Figma to EVA<\/span>/<span class=""fs-12"">Figma to EVA<\/span>\n      <\/a>/' "$file")
